original_title: The Huntress: Rune of the Dead
overview: When Runaâ€™s father disappears on a viking journey she steps up as head of her family, but she is tormented by strange nightmares. One day when she is out hunting, she stumbles across a wounded warrior who carries news of her father, new that seem connected to her dreams. Something is coming for them, something vile.
tagline: When Darkness Falls A Hero Rises
title: The Huntress: Rune of the Dead
